get.summary: Simple helper endpoint to get all enum values for UI dropdowns.

apiAggregationType.description:
Aggregation type for time-series data.

 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_NONE: No aggregation (raw data).
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_AVG: Average values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_MIN: Minimum values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_MAX: Maximum values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_SUM: Sum of values.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_COUNT: Count of data points.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_FIRST: First value in time window.
 - AGGREGATION_TYPE_LAST: Last value in time window.

apiAssetType.description:
- ASSET_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown asset type.
 - ASSET_TYPE_AMR_WATER_METER_INDUCTIVE: AMR Water meter Inductive.
 - ASSET_TYPE_WATER_METER_MAGNETIC: AMR Water meter magnetic device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_AMR_WATER_METER_PULSE: AMR Water meter pulse device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_ULTRASONIC_WATER_METER: ULTRASONIC Water Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_ENERGY_METER: Energy Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GAS_METER: GAS Meter device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_GPS_TRACKER: GPS Tracker device.
 - ASSET_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY: LoRaWAN Gateway device.

apiDeviceType.description:
Communication mode enumeration - unified for inventory and other services.

 - DEVICE_TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN: LoRaWAN device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM: Cellular MQTT device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_LTE: Cellular TCP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_CELLULAR_GSM_LTE: Cellular UDP device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_GATEWAY: Gateway device type.
 - DEVICE_TYPE_LORAWAN_GATEWAY: LoRaWAN Gateway device type.

apiDownlinkMode.description:
Downlink delivery mode enumeration.

 - DOWNLINK_MODE_IMMEDIATE: Immediate downlink (for always-on devices).
 - DOWNLINK_MODE_QUEUED: Queued downlink (for battery-powered devices, sent on next uplink).
 - DOWNLINK_MODE_SCHEDULED: Scheduled downlink (sent at specific time).

apiInventoryStatus.description:
Inventory status enumeration.

 - INVENTORY_STATUS_INVENTORY: Device in inventory, not yet onboarded.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_ONBOARDED: Device onboarded to platform.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_PROVISIONED: Device provisioned and active.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_DECOMMISSIONED: Device decommissioned.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_FAULTY: Device reported as faulty.
 - INVENTORY_STATUS_LOST: Device lost or stolen.

apiListEnumsHelperResponse.description: Simple response for UI helper endpoint with concrete enum values.

apiLocationSource.description:
Location source enumeration - unified across all services.

 - LOCATION_SOURCE_UNKNOWN: Unknown location source.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GPS: GPS coordinates.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_MANUAL: Manually configured.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_TRIANGULATION: Calculated via triangulation.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_WIFI: WiFi-based location.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_MANUAL_OVERRIDE: Manual override.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_CONFIG: Configuration-based.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_TDOA: GEO resolver TDOA.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_RSSI: GEO resolver RSSI.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_GNSS: GEO resolver GNSS.
 - LOCATION_SOURCE_GEO_RESOLVER_WIFI: GEO resolver WiFi.

apiTimeInterval.description:
Time interval for aggregation.

 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE: 1 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE_5: 5 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE_15: 15 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MINUTE_30: 30 minute intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_HOUR: 1 hour intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_HOUR_6: 6 hour intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_HOUR_12: 12 hour intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_DAY: 1 day intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_WEEK: 1 week intervals.
 - TIME_INTERVAL_MONTH: 1 month intervals.

apiTransportProtocol.description:
Transport protocol enumeration - unified for inventory and data services.

 - TRANSPORT_PROTOCOL_UNKNOWN: Unknown protocol.
 - TRANSPORT_LORAWAN: LoRaWAN.
 - TRANSPORT_HTTP: HTTP/HTTPS over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_MQTT: MQTT over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_TCP: TCP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_UDP: UDP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_COAP: CoAP over  (2G/3G/4G/5G/NB-IoT/LTE-M/WIFI).
 - TRANSPORT_WEBSOCKET: WebSocket.
